channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Ranger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Ranger

item.title: CVE-2018-11778|2024-09-17T03:18:51.761Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ranger
item.description: UnixAuthenticationService in Apache Ranger 1.2.0 was updated to correctly handle user input to avoid Stack-based buffer overflow. Versions prior to 1.2.0 should be upgraded to 1.2.0

item.title: CVE-2016-6815|2024-09-17T04:14:03.099Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20ranger
item.description: In Apache Ranger before 0.6.2, users with "keyadmin" role should not be allowed to change password for users with "admin" role.
